PrimaryAxis: the primary axis to use for float controls
LimitEnabled: True if the control has limits.
bDrawLimits:
True if the limits should be drawn in debug.
For this to be enabled you need to have at least one min and max limit turned on.
MinimumValue: The minimum limit of the control's value
MaximumValue: The maximum limit of the control's value
bShapeVisible: Set to true if the shape is currently visible in 3d
ShapeVisibility: Defines how the shape visibility should be changed
ShapeName: This is optional UI setting - this doesn't mean this is always used, but it is optional for manipulation layer to use this
bIsTransientControl: If the control is transient and only visible in the control rig editor
ControlEnum: If the control is integer it can use this enum to choose values
Customization:
The User interface customization used for a control
This will be used as the default content for the space picker and other widgets
DrivenControls: The list of driven controls for this proxy control.
bGroupWithParentControl: If set to true the animation channel will be grouped with the parent control in sequencer
bRestrictSpaceSwitching: Allow to space switch only to the available spaces
FilteredChannels: Filtered Visible Transform channels. If this is empty everything is visible
PreferredRotationOrder: The euler rotation order this control prefers for animation, if we aren't using default UE rotator
bUsePreferredRotationOrder: Whether to use a specified rotation order or just use the default FRotator order and conversion functions
